name: BBNRussian
0:
”Alexa, play BBN Russian”
”Alexa, start BBN Russian”
”Alexa, open BBN Russian”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: b. b. n. russian
des:
BBN Russian is a part of the Bible Broadcasting Network. BBN is All Christian Radio streaming in 8 languages: English, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, German and Russian. BBN provides the best Christian music and programming 24/7.

To start, just say "Alexa, play BBN Russian" or "Alexa, start BBN Russian".

At anytime, you can stop BBN Russian by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
